appUpdateStatus:
[32mNextcloud core update available: Version 28.0.10[39m
[32m1 app update(s) available.[39m
SCRIPT_NAME: The name of the script (SMTP Relay with msmtp)
DEBUG: Used for debug mode (1 = ON, 0 = OFF)
SMTP_PORT: The port used for the SMTP connection
NEEDS_CREDENTIALS: Flag to determine if credentials are needed for SMTP
SMTP2GO: Flag to indicate if SMTP2GO service is used
MAIL_USERNAME: The username for the SMTP server
MAIL_PASSWORD: The password for the SMTP server
RECIPIENT: The recipient email address for sending emails
SELF_SIGNED_CERT: Flag to indicate if the server uses self-signed certificates
MSMTP_ENCRYPTION1: First part of encryption settings for msmtp
MSMTP_ENCRYPTION2: Second part of encryption settings for msmtp
DEFAULT_PORT: Default port based on the selected encryption
choice: User's choice of mail provider or setup option
TITLE: The title for whiptail menus
TEST_MAIL: Message template for sending test emails
DEDYNDOMAIN: The domain name used for TLS activation.
TLSDOMAIN: The domain to be set for the Nextcloud TLS configuration.
PHPVER: Current PHP version in use for Apache conf file.
CERTFILES: Directory where SSL certificates are stored.
SETENVPROXY: SetEnv proxy-sendcl variable for specific Ubuntu versions.
DEDYNPORT: Custom port for public access if the user decides to change it.
